statements: SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM CourseSchedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_date, end_date FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, assignment_name, deadline FROM CourseSchedule WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE end_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_date = '2022-06-20';
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule_date FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM assignment;
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM assignment WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM course_schedule ORDER BY course_name ASC, instructor DESC;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(course_id) as num_courses FROM course_schedule GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT course_name, assignment_name, deadline FROM course_schedule INNER JOIN assignment ON course_schedule.course_id = assignment.course_id WHERE deadline < '2022-05-01';
SELECT DISTINCT instructor FROM course_schedule;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM assignments WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, schedule_time FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM deadlines WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY deadline_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule LIMIT 5;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, schedule_time FROM course_schedule ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name, deadline FROM assignments WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_name, status FROM assignments JOIN deadlines ON assignments.assignment_id = deadlines.assignment_id WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule;
SELECT schedule_time, course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE assignment_id = 1;
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM assignments WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY course_id DESC
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, schedule_time FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_time < NOW() AND instructor_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT course_name, assignment_name, deadline FROM course_schedule INNER JOIN assignments ON course_schedule.course_id = assignments.course_id WHERE deadline > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY deadline ASC
SELECT task_name, completed FROM time_management WHERE deadline_id IN (SELECT deadline_id FROM deadlines WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE)
SELECT * FROM time_management WHERE task_name LIKE '%project%'
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31'
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE course_id = 3
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) as total_assignments FROM courses LEFT JOIN assignments ON courses.course_id = assignments.course_id GROUP BY course_name
SELECT course_name, deadline_name, due_date FROM deadlines JOIN courses ON deadlines.course_id = courses.course_id
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM assignments WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY assignment_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE course_id = 3 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM deadlines WHERE course_id = 4 AND assignment_id = 2 ORDER BY due_date ASC;
